cause.description:
Sudden Infant Death Syndrome is the unexpected death of a child under a year of age that can not be otherwise explained upon close examination and autopsy. SIDS has a terrible impact on the family of the infants due which is strengthened by its sudden, unexpected nature.
In memory of my cousin, Drew, and for everything he gave us in his four months here.
1. Research on SIDS is necessary.
2. Education about prevention methods is important.
3. Support for the families of SIDS victims is vital.
cause.mission: promote SIDS research, public education, and help grieving families and friends of SIDS victims.
cause.name: SIDS Research and Support
